title: Tim Kane made Vice President of the National Convention with Hillary Clinton in 2011
subtitle: While the timetable for Tim Kane ' s former position as President of CNDP is almost accurate, political reporting since then points to a series of more complex events.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Hilary Clinton, candidate Tim Kane, stepped aside as the chair of the National Convention in 2011 to allow Clinton's supportive Debbie Wasserman Schultz to take over the workplace.
